name: Hill St
description: A residential stretch of Hill Street, bordering a small, unassuming park. You are on Hill St. A small park is visible to the east, a patch of green amidst the encroaching asphalt, where a few children play, their laughter a fleeting counterpoint to the general weariness of the neighborhood. Hill St continues its journey to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
